alert.note: Alert for Marion; Walker; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 9:25PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Walker, southeastern Marion and southwestern Winston Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 925 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brilliant, or near Winfield, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Winfield, Carbon Hill, Lynn, Guin, Brilliant, Glen Allen, Kansas, Nauvoo, Eldridge, Ashbank, Poplar Springs, Lake Buttahatchee, Twin, Natural Bridge, Tucker, Pearces Mill, Texas and Piney Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for central, northwestern and west central Alabama.
